code: import{likepost}from"../../types";export var LikePostAction=function LikePostAction(current_new_posts){return{type:likepost,payload:current_new_posts};};var LikePostFunction=function LikePostFunction(props,post_id,new_post){return function(dispatch){var URL="https://motion.propulsion-home.ch/backend/api/social/posts/toggle-like/"+post_id+"/";var current_new_posts=props.PostsReducer.new_liked_posts;current_new_posts.push(new_post);var token=props.props.SignInReducer.token;var headers=new Headers({'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)});var config={method:'POST',headers:headers,body:{images:[],shared:{},content:''}};fetch(URL,config);dispatch(LikePostAction(current_new_posts));};};export default LikePostFunction;
